key.name: last-entry-location
key.summary: Location of the last playing entry
key.description: This entry will be automatically played by rhythmbox upon startup.

key.name: playback-time
key.summary: Playback time of the last playing entry
key.description: Rhythmbox will resume playback from this second.

key.name: browser-values
key.description: Remembers the filters in RBLibraryBrowser and sets on start up.

key.name: playlist
key.description: Name of the last playing playlist if any.

key.name: play-state
key.description: Whether the entry was playing or not

key.name: startup-state
key.description: 1 play-pause, 2 pause, 3 play, 4 select source, 5 select last playlist

key.name: source
key.description: Name of the last playing source if any.
